title: Track surplus cases before anyone else
content: We monitor North Port tax deed cases as soon as they're filed. Know which properties are heading to auction — before the surplus hits.

title: Structured data with zero cleanup
content: We extract every useful field from messy county websites. Owner addresses, PDFs, parcel IDs — all normalized, deduplicated, and CSV-ready.

title: Documents and leads in one place
content: No more chasing PDFs or reverse searching owners. All court filings, case logs, and claim docs come with each lead — pre-sorted and downloadable.

title: Built for surplus recovery agents
content: This isn't a generic data scraper. It's purpose-built for claim professionals, investors, and researchers looking to act fast — and win fast.
